author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes a bug in LHCInfo PopCon: before the fix it saved only up to 100 payloads for a fill because it used to get only up to 100 lumisections from a query to OMS which API has default page limit of 100 entries.  
The fix consits of adding functionality to `cond::OMSService` for setting the page limit and using it in `LHCInfoPopConSourceHandler.cc` with limit set to a constant of 4000 which is enough for fills not exceeding 25 hours.

#### PR validation:

Verified retrieval of more than 100LS with local tests running LHCInfoPopConAnalyzerStartFill.py and LHCInfoPopConAnalyzerEndFill.py and checking the logs and payloads written to local sqlite database. In the logs there were lines "Found ... lumisections during the fill ..." with lumisections number higher than 100 confirming the fix.
title: PPS fixed LHCInfo PopCon 100 lumisections query limit
